transcript:
Agent: Hi, is this Mr. Johnson? 
Customer: Yes, it is. Who's calling?
Agent: My name is Emily, and I'm calling from GreenTech Solutions. We specialize in energy-efficient products for homes and businesses.
Customer: Okay, what can you do for me?
Agent: We've recently launched a new line of smart thermostats that can help reduce your energy bills by up to 30%.
Customer: That sounds interesting. I've been looking for ways to cut down on my energy costs.
Agent: Great! Our product is easy to install and can be controlled remotely through your smartphone.
Customer: How much does it cost?
Agent: The price starts at $250, but we're currently offering a 10% discount for first-time customers.
Customer: That's still a bit pricey for me. What kind of warranty do you offer?
Agent: We offer a 5-year warranty on all our products, and our customer support team is available 24/7.
Customer: Okay, that sounds good. Can you tell me more about the installation process?
Agent: Absolutely. We offer free installation for all our customers, and it usually takes about an hour to complete.
Customer: Alright, I think I'm interested. Can you send me a quote and some more information?
Agent: I'd be happy to. I'll send you an email with all the details. Would you like me to follow up with you next week?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. Thank you, Emily.
Agent: You're welcome, Mr. Johnson. I look forward to speaking with you next week.
Customer: You too, thanks. Bye.
Agent: Bye, have a great day!
